The Vir Chakra (pronunciation: ʋiːɾa tʃakɾa, ) is an Indian wartime military bravery award presented for acts of gallantry on the battlefield, on land or in the air or at sea. The list consists of recipients of Vir Chakra awardee from 2020 to 2029.
Recipients (2020-2029)
Five people (4 posthumously) from the Indian Army have been awarded with the chakra from 2020. All of the recipient of the 2021 lists have been awarded Vir Chakra for their exemplary bravery dury Sino Indian Skirmish 2020.
